pr_title: DROOLS-5756 DMN kie-camel local/embedded execution capability and demo

timeline.message: DROOLS-5756 DMN kie-camel local/embedded execution capability and demo

timeline.bodyText:
What about merge ToMapProcessor logic with ToDMNEvaluateAllCommandProcessor? Something like an additional optional parameter for the constructor to specify where to put the exchange body. If this value is not provided and the body is a Map we can use the whole object as input.
Wdyt?
timeline.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText:
I thought about that indeed, but at least in my experience Camel route is very similar to ETL, so you want the basic components/block to not do "too much" if possible.
This way:

if the user want to collapse the two steps into one, can always do it since they are very trivial
if the user has other steps or different steps, can compose the steps in the best fit: example, the user might be looking to transform the exchange into a Map as part of another ETL step.

So I see your point, but providing the basic steps and the basic version of the components, is the best approach in my limited Camel experience
replies.author: tarilabs
